annotations.description: Specify the annotations to be added to the ingress
annotations.title: annotations

class.description: Specify the class of ingress to use
class.title: class

classInSpec.description: Set ingress class in '.spec.ingressClassName' instead of 'kubernetes.io/ingress.class' annotation.
classInSpec.title: classInSpec

domain.description: Specify the domain you want to expose
domain.title: domain

existingServiceName.description: If specified, use an existing Service rather than creating one
existingServiceName.title: existingServiceName

gatewayHost.description: Specify the host of the ingress gateway, which is used to generate the endpoints when the host is empty.
gatewayHost.title: gatewayHost

http.description: Specify the mapping relationship between the http path and the workload port
http.title: http

labels.description: Specify the labels to be added to the ingress
labels.title: labels

name.description: Specify a unique name for this gateway, required to support multiple gateway traits on a component
name.title: name

pathType.description: Specify a pathType for the ingress rules, defaults to "ImplementationSpecific"
pathType.title: pathType

secretName.description: Specify the secret name you want to quote to use tls.
secretName.title: secretName
